Uses of Class
peregrine.metrics.impl.CounterMetric

Packages that use CounterMetric
peregrine.client Client API implementation which supports GET, SCAN, PUT, etc. 
peregrine.metrics Metric functionality enabling peregrine to export stats for external performance analysis.
